metadata.synopsis: A Zhentarim agent guarding a trader from her organisation.
metadata.how_to_trigger: in main menu: loadlevel SCL_Main_Agoto -173; 23; -177speak with Erna

0.speaker: Erna
0.text: You trying to get me in trouble?
0.context: NodeContext: Smiling but fobbing us off.

1.speaker: Erna
1.text: It's Roah you want. We only talk when you've misbehaved.
1.context: NodeContext: Pleasant and placid - a fact, not a threat. Name is pronounced ROW-ah (row as in 'row your boat')
